title: any help please
body: yesterday i found out someone logged onto my account without me knowing. i have not shared my password with anyone and i since then changed it (obviously) but i know someone did because my summoner icon was changed from what i had before and when i went to play a game, it said my account was logged onto a different account and made me sign in again. there were no games played (thank god) but still i want to make sure that it doesn't happen again. are there any other precautions i could take to make my account a bit more secure? any help would be greatly appreciated thank you.

replies.body: It's scary to come online to find that someone else may have been on your account, and there's certainly steps you can take to improve security!  Check out our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide which offers some wisdom on keeping your info safe in and outside of league.  If you need any help recovering the account then hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account recovery team is happy to help!
